title: Elmer's Magical Liquid Slime Activator (8.75 fluid ounces) and Elmer's Glow in the Dark Liquid Glue, Great for Making Slime, Washable, Assorted Colors, 5 Ounces Each
description: Electrify arts, crafts, and slime with the Neon shine of Elmer's glow-in-the-dark liquid glue. While bright in the day, this craft glue truly comes to life at night, lighting up with a luminous Neon Glow. It’s also great for making glue slime-just mix with a few common household ingredients like baking soda and contact solution. Washable, safe, nontoxic, and flexible when dry, Elmer's glue is an easy, mess-free way to get creative for arts and craft projects. Whether used for decorating, painting, gluing, or making slime, the possibilities are endless.
